alert.note: Alert for Nowata; Osage; Rogers; Washington (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 12:29PM CDT until July 17 at 1:15PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Rogers County in northeastern Oklahoma... East central Osage County in northeastern Oklahoma... Washington County in northeastern Oklahoma... Nowata County in northeastern Oklahoma... * Until 115 PM CDT. * At 1229 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Delaware to 4 miles southeast of Okesa, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations in or near the path include... Bartlesville... Nowata... Dewey... Chelsea... Oologah... Copan... Ramona... Ochelata... Delaware... Lenapah... Talala... Vera... Wann... New Alluwe... Bartlesville Municipal Airport... Watova... Okesa... Bushyhead... THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
